name: 2021 4th International Conference on Education Technology Management
content: Publicationï¼š Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees and reviewers, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8580-0), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
